name: Sunset Kaiju
description:
It's a jet-flying shooter where you have to protect your city from a kaiju. 

Controlls:

ACCELRETION"UP" or "W"TURN LEFT"LEFT" or "A"TURN RIGHT"RIGHT" or "D"SHOOT"SPACE", "J" or "LBM"

Spend ~15 hours on it, was rushing to make it at least barely playable in last hours of game jam.

Game engine: Godot 4.0.1

Used resources:

TV Shader: VHS and CRT monitor effect - Godot Shaders

Music: ‘Klendathu Drop’ by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio”
